text: Linda Janell Carson ( Smith, May 3, 1947 â€“ July 25, 2020) was an American sprinter. She competed in the women's 400 metres at the 1964 Summer Olympics. She was born in Killeen, Texas. Smith died of cancer on July 25, 2020 at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Kansas Category:Olympians for the United States Category:American sprinters Category:Sportspeople from Texas
